title: FIRST NATION GROUP, LLC secures contract for First Nation Group, LLC dba Jordan Reses Supply
body:
United States, Oct. 14 -- Contract Id: 1744020

Description: United States based FIRST NATION GROUP, LLC has secured contract from Department of Veterans 
Affairs for First Nation Group, LLC dba Jordan Reses Supply.

The contract is valued approximately $1,529,724,440.00.

Country: United States

Sector: Industry

Contract awarded to FIRST NATION GROUP, LLC;4566 HWY 20 E COURT YARD PLZ STE 
208;NICEVILLE;FL;32578

Contract awarded to executing agency: Department of Veterans Affairs Department of Veterans Affairs;OPAL / 
National Acquisition Center;Building 37;1st Avenue, One Block North of Cermak;Hines IL 60141

article or any other content requirement, please contact Editor at contentservices@htlive.com
